adverb.description: At, to, or by a greater distance (used to indicate the extent to which one thing or person is or becomes distant from another)
examples: the farther away you are from your home, the better you should behave
his action pushes Haiti even farther away from democratic rule

adverb.description: Over a greater expanse of space or time; for a longer way.
examples: the stream fills the passage, and only a cave diver can explore farther
people were trying to get their food dollars to go farther

adjective.description: More distant in space than another item of the same kind.
examples: the farther side of the mountain
